alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 5:48AM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Water reaches the Maples area of Shelton. At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 11.0 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Tue 5 am: 14.2 Forecast: Tue 7 am 14.2 Tue 1 pm 14.2 Tue 7 pm 14.1 Wed 1 am 14.1 Wed 7 am 14.1 Wed 1 pm 13.7 Wed 7 pm 13.2 Thu 1 am 12.7 Thu 7 am 12.1 Thu 1 pm 11.7 Thu 7 pm 11.4 Fri 1 am 11.0 &&
